channel.title: Pages on Ben Does Baseball
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Ben Does Baseball

item.title: Resources
item.description: Some resources used for the posts on this site: Fangraphs: Analytical articles and statistical database Baseball-Reference: Very thorough statistical database Baseball Savant: Statcast/advanced metrics search and leaderboards Brooks Baseball: PitchFX analysis and granular data From a technical side: Plot.ly Hugo RStudio BaseballR package
